ygData.subject: Over Crowded
ygData.msgSnippet: I think allowing us to move from server to server would be a bad idea.  I think it d cause to many problems, just my luck they d be some bug caused by moving
ygData.messageBody:
I think allowing us to move from server to server would be a bad idea. I
think it'd cause to many problems, just my luck they'd be some bug caused by
moving like that and my character would get deleted for good or messed up
bad. But I take it back about hurrying up and giving us that new land mass,
I don't want them to rush it and have tons of bugs in it. But the idea
about locking out the newbies to certin servers that is a good idea. I'd
say Rathe and Xeynos and Finnin Ro should be the main three that they get
locked out of for a while. Not trying to be mean to new players but those
servers are getting too many players on them and at times you have TONS of
trouble finding a place to hunt and it can also cause TONS of lag in that
area if there too many players camped there.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
> Thats true until it settles down. The other problem is that the server is
> overcrowded the begin with. The main oringinal servers are always over
1500
> people in peak hours. IMHO.. Maybe they should lock full servers up to
new
> people. Make them play the less crowded servers. Or maybe they will
allow
> people to move from one server to another server with thier charector. I
> know this will never happen but who know...
>
> Qanin
> The Rathe
>
> > ----------
> > From: Azor[SMTP:jmaynus@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 8:54 AM
> > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
> >
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > Then I think Verant needs to really do something about all this. I mean
> > if
> > places like Unrest and Cazic are gonna be so over crowded that it cause
so
> > much lag then maybe they should hurry up and give as that new land mass
> > they
> > been working on or something. But of course once we get this on land
mass
> > you know it'll be crowded for a long time, everyone will be dying to go
> > see
> > what it's like.
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> > **************************
